      "DOGE also bullish with MACD at 0.67 and consistent uptrend",
      "SOL showing significant downtrend despite high open interest",
      "BTC and XRP showing mixed signals with recent weakness",
      "Funding rates mixed: ETH, SOL, XRP, DOGE positive; BTC, BNB negative"

    "reasoning": "ETH shows strongest momentum with consistent uptrend from 137.84 to 141.36, positive funding rate indicating bullish sentiment, and price above EMA20. MACD recently turned positive at -0.34 but improving trend.",

  "chain_of_thought": "Step 1: No open positions to review or exit. Step 2: Analyzed all 6 coins for entry opportunities. Step 3: ETH shows strongest uptrend (137.84→141.36), positive funding rate (2.45e-4), and price above EMA20 (141.36 vs 141.08).
